assets.notes: Generic loading spinner from a WordPress plugin. Not a brand asset. Should be replaced by a modern CSS spinner or a custom, branded loading animation during the rebuild.

shots: Professional headshots and group shots of all attorneys, showcasing professionalism and approachability.
Interior shots of the firm's office space, including reception areas, meeting rooms, and attorney offices, to convey a professional and welcoming environment.
Exterior shots of the firm's building/location, if distinctive, to establish a sense of place.
Candid shots of attorneys collaborating or engaged in work to demonstrate team cohesion and active practice.
photographyBrief.style: Modern professional, authentic, well-lit, high-resolution, conveying trustworthiness and expertise without being overly formal or sterile.

images.description: Custom icons for 'Areas of Practice' and other service-related sections, designed in a style consistent with the new brand aesthetic.
images.purpose: To visually break up text, enhance readability, and reinforce concepts for service offerings and key firm features.
